titles.title: Protecting Access to Affordable Medicines Act of 2020
Protecting Access to Affordable Medicines Act of 2020
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit additional rebates under the Medicaid program for certain noninnovator multiple source drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Protecting Access to Affordable Medicines Act of 2020
This bill prohibits additional rebates for certain drugs under the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program. Specifically, the bill prohibits additional rebates with respect to noninnovator multiple-source drugs (i.e., generics) for which the average manufacturer price is less than $1.
